page.title: 07School 2
page.content: Outside the school is a playing field.At the back of the field is an air raid shelter. It was used in the war so you could hide away from the bombs. Some of the lessons we do are Mathematics, English, Spelling, Local Studies, Geography, History, Physical Education, Art and Games. My favourite subject is Art. Emma likes Maths. The Maths book we use most is called the Scottish Primary Maths Group book, or S.P.M.G. for short. We also have Mental Maths and sometimes we do practical Maths. We do Science as well. Sometimes we do experiments with magnets or rubber bands and things. I like Science.
